cubrid_rollback -- Executes rollback on the transaction

  bool cubrid_rollback(resource conn_identifier)~

The |cubrid_rollback| function executes rollback on the transaction pointed by
{conn_handle}, currently in progress.

Connection to server is closed after calling |cubrid_rollback|. Connection
handle, however, is still valid.

{conn_identifier} Connection identifier.

TRUE, when process is successful.

FALSE, when process is unsuccessful.

|cubrid_rollback| example

<?php >
  $req = cubrid_execute ($oid, "insert into person values (2,’John’)");
  if ($req) {
     cubrid_close_request ($req);
     if ($failed) {
        cubrid_rollback ($con);
     } else {
        cubrid_commit ($con);
     }
  }
?>



|cubrid_commit| |cubrid_disconnect|

vim:ft=help:
